alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 12:57PM CST until March 02 at 1:45PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Archer County in northern Texas... Southern Wichita County in northern Texas... Eastern Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 145 PM CST. * At 1257 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Lake Kickapoo, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wichita Falls, Archer City, Holliday, Scotland, Windthorst, Megargel, Lake Diversion, Dundee, Westover, Mankins, Lake Kickapoo, Lakeside City and Pleasant Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
